title: What are some important scientific names? - Quora

response.answer_text: 👌 Scientific Name 👌 ❤️❤️ IMPORTANT SCIENTIFIC NAME'S ❤️❤️ 1. Human --- Homo sapiens 2. Frog --- Rana Tigrina 3. Cat --- Felis domestica 4. Dogs --- Canis Families 5. Cow --- Boss Indicus 6. Buffalo --- Bubalis Bubalis 7.Ox --- Boss Primitive Tars 8. Goat --- Kepta Hitmus 9. Sheep --- Ovi's Arise 10.Pig --- Susphroca domestica 11.Lion --- Panthero Leo 12. Tiger --- pantheon tigris 13. Panther --- Panther pardus 14. Bear --- Ursus matitimus carnevera 15. Rabbit --- Orictolegus cuniculus. 16. Deer --- Cervus Elaphas 17. Camel --- Camelus Domedarius 18. Fox --- Canidae 19. Langur --- Hominodia 20. Reindeer --- Ruservus Duvacelli 21.Makhhi --- Musca domestica 22. Mango --- Magnifera indica 23. Dhaan--- Oriya Sativat 24. Wheat --- Tricticum aestivium 25. Pea --- Pisum Sativium 26. Mustard --- Brassica Compastories 27.Peacock --- Pavo Christas 28. Elephant --- Afilas Indica 29. Dolphin --- Platenista gangetica 30. Kamal --- Nelumbo nucifera Garten 31.Banyan --- --- Ficus Bandhanlensis 32. Horse --- Equus Caballas 33. Sugarcane --- Sugarson officinarum 34. Onion --- Allium Sepia 35. Cotton --- Gaspium 36. Peanut --- Arachis hijopia 37. Coffee --- Coffea Arabica 38. Tea--- Thia sinensis 39. Grapes --- Vitius 40. Turmeric -- Kurkuma Longa 41.Corn --- Jia Mej 42.
